item.title: What does marriage mean?
item.description: "Our phone calls aren't going to be that long!" turned into a 2.5 hour conversation covering thoughts on asking for help at work, becoming Bruce Lee, and "why marry?".
item.itunes:subtitle: "Our phone calls aren't going to be that long!" turned into a 2.5 hour conversation covering thoughts on asking for help at work, becoming Bruce Lee, and "why marry?".
